---
title: "Appendix: System Assumptions"
---

This appendix lists the physical constants, hardware specifications, and economic assumptions used to calculate the "Napkin Math" throughout this book. These values are defined in the book's source code (`physx/constants.py`) and ensure that all derivations are consistent.

```{python}
#| echo: false
from physx import constants
import pint

def fmt_val(val):
    if isinstance(val, pint.Quantity):
        # Use general format to avoid trailing zeros but keep precision
        return f"{val.magnitude:g}"
    return f"{val:g}"

def fmt_unit(val):
    if isinstance(val, pint.Quantity):
        return f"{val.units}"
    return "-"

A100_FLOPS_FP16_TENSOR_val = fmt_val(constants.A100_FLOPS_FP16_TENSOR)
A100_FLOPS_FP16_TENSOR_unit = fmt_unit(constants.A100_FLOPS_FP16_TENSOR)
```
